title: Walk the London Wall
name: Millennium Bridge
content: A steel pedestrian suspension bridge over the Thames.  Construction started in 1998 and it opened in 2000, only for it to close again due to wobbling.  This turned out to be the result of a little-researched phenomenon where pedestrian unconsciously synchronise their gait.  It re-opened in 2002 after work to compensate for this.  It has become an icon of modern London and has appeared in movies. | image=London Millennium Bridge from Saint Paul's.jpg
